name: Emoji game
description:
Interactive fiction expressed in 5 emoji languages. Made with Twine 2. 

Small funny story about one knight, who was  caught in a bad situation...

  • 5 good endings
  • 5 differrent emoji styles 
  • Over 900 images
  • Non-linear plot
  • Fortepiano soundtrack (by Eric Matyas http://soundimage.org/)

Online versions links:

 http://rilarhiv.ru/online/emoji_game/o_O.html 

 https://gamejolt.com/games/emoji_game/263858
